00023 class VietnameseTextRenderer : public AbstractTextRenderer {
00024     typedef AbstractTextRenderer Base;
00025 
00026     public:
00027         virtual ~VietnameseTextRenderer();
00028 
00030         static VietnameseTextRenderer& GetInstance();
00031 
00033         virtual BOOLEAN IsStandaloneCharacter(const WCHAR* text,
00034                                               INT index);
00035         
00036     protected:
00037         VietnameseTextRenderer();

00040                               const WCHAR* substitution_char,
00041                               INT n_chars,
00042                               GlyphPtr glyph,
00043                               INT& parsed_glyphs,
00044                               BOOLEAN& is_diacritic);
00045 
00046     private:
00047         enum VietnameseCharacterType {
00048             Diacritic,              
00049             DiacriticBreve,         // can only be combined with a
00050             DiacriticCircumflex,    // can only be combined with a, e, and o
00051             DiacriticHorn,          // can only be combined with o and u
00052 
00053             ToneMark,
00054             ToneMarkGrave,
00055             ToneMarkAcute,
00056             ToneMarkTilde,
00057             ToneMarkHookAbove,
00058             ToneMarkDotBelow,
00059 
00060             Vowel,
00061             VowelA,
00062             VowelE,
00063             VowelI,
00064             VowelO,
00065             VowelU,
00066             VowelY,
00067 
00068             TonemarkCombinableVowel,    // vowels already combined with diacritic, as well as y and i (which cannot be combined with diacritics)
00069             TonemarkCombinableVowelA,
00070             TonemarkCombinableVowelE,
00071             TonemarkCombinableVowelO,
00072             TonemarkCombinableVowelU,
00073 
00074             DiacriticCombinableVowel,   // vowels a, e, o, u already combined with tonemark (another tone mark is not possible, only a (specific, depending on the vowel) diacritic)
00075             DiacriticCombinableVowelA,
00076             DiacriticCombinableVowelE,
00077             DiacriticCombinableVowelO,
00078             DiacriticCombinableVowelU,
00079             
00080             None                        // used for non-vowels and vowels with both diacritic and tone mark, as well as i and y with tonemark, and non-combinable characters
00081         };
00082         
00095         BOOLEAN GetCombinedCharacter(const WCHAR* cur_char, const WCHAR* next_char, WCHAR& combined_char, BOOLEAN& syntax_valid);
00096 
00113         VietnameseCharacterType GetCharacterType(const WCHAR* ch,
00114                                                  VietnameseCharacterType& specific_type, 
00115                                                  VietnameseCharacterType& modifier_type,
00116                                                  BOOLEAN& is_capital_letter) const;
00117 };
